title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 19.2 - Certificates of religious and denominational institutions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 19.2 - Certificates of religious and denominational institutions

State Regulations

Certificates to be filed by religious or denominational
institutions shall be verified and contain the following: (a) name of institution; (b) address; (c) name of religious or denominational
organization by which operated, controlled or supervised; (d) statement of the provision, by law or
otherwise, under which the operation, control or supervision is vested and
exercised; (e) statement that
institution elects to be considered a religious or denominational
institution; (f) statement as to
whether institution admits nonmembers of the particular denomination; and
(g) signature of chief
executive officer and verification. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 8

19.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
